scripts.all: npm run w3c && npm run w3c-tr && npm run whatwg
scripts.diff: npm run w3c-diff && npm run w3c-tr-diff && npm run whatwg-diff
scripts.diffnew: npm run w3c-diffnew && npm run w3c-tr-diffnew && npm runwhatwg-diffnew
scripts.w3c: npm run w3c-crawl && npm run w3c-study && npm run w3c-html && npm run w3c-diff && npm run w3c-diffnew
scripts.w3c-study: node study-specs.js ./reports/w3c/crawl.json perspec > reports/w3c/index.md && node study-specs.js ./reports/w3c/crawl.json > reports/w3c/perissue.md
scripts.w3c-html: pandoc reports/w3c/index.md -f markdown -t html5 --section-divs -s --template report-template.html -o reports/w3c/index.html && pandoc reports/w3c/perissue.md -f markdown -t html5 --section-divs -s --template report-perissue-template.html -o reports/w3c/perissue.html
scripts.w3c-tr: npm run w3c-tr-crawl && npm run w3c-tr-study && npm run w3c-tr-html && npm run w3c-tr-diff && npm run w3c-tr-diffnew
scripts.w3c-tr-study: node study-specs.js ./reports/w3c-tr/crawl.json perspec > reports/w3c-tr/index.md && node study-specs.js ./reports/w3c-tr/crawl.json > reports/w3c-tr/perissue.md
scripts.w3c-tr-html: pandoc reports/w3c-tr/index.md -f markdown -t html5 --section-divs -s --template report-template.html -o reports/w3c-tr/index.html && pandoc reports/w3c-tr/perissue.md -f markdown -t html5 --section-divs -s --template report-perissue-template.html -o reports/w3c-tr/perissue.html
scripts.whatwg: npm run-script whatwg-crawl && npm run-script whatwg-study && npm run-script whatwg-html && npm run whatwg-diff && npm run whatwg-diffnew
scripts.whatwg-study: node study-specs.js ./reports/whatwg/crawl.json perspec > reports/whatwg/index.md && node study-specs.js ./reports/whatwg/crawl.json > reports/whatwg/perissue.md
scripts.whatwg-html: pandoc reports/whatwg/index.md -f markdown -t html5 --section-divs -s --template report-template.html -o reports/whatwg/index.html && pandoc reports/whatwg/perissue.md -f markdown -t html5 --section-divs -s --template report-perissue-template.html -o reports/whatwg/perissue.html
